    "comment": "When any fan receives a physical Fast On (DFON) during evening/overnight hours, set backlight index 10 on all fans.",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "51 71 F6 3", "control": "DFON" } },

        { "==": { "device": "51 71 F6 4", "control": "DFON" } },

      { "device": "51 71 F6 3", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 10, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "51 71 F6 4", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 10, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },

Then issue the Backlight (BL) accept command on each device with index 10 (uom 25, precision 0) so the physical action immediately updates visible backlight on all fans."
